question: Which of the following kings was earlier a Jaina but later took up Shaivism under the influence of Appar?
explanation: Mahendravarman I, who ruled the Pallava dynasty from 590 A.D. to 630 A.D. was the son and successor of King Simhavishnu. He was earlier a Jaina but later took up Shaivism under the influence of Appar.
